name: Go Notes
description:
Drive a racing car using your real like instrument!

Using the microphone on your device, GoNotes lets you drive a racing car around a track by playing the displayed note on your instrument. Try to beat your fastest time, by playing notes as quickly and accurately as possible, and challenge friends to beat your high score. Learn the notes of your instrument in a fun way, or challenge yourself to extend your range. 

The game is compatible with all instruments, and the instrument pitch can be configured in settings. An instrument is required to play this game.
